name: Run, Sushi, Run!
description:
Run, Sushi, Run!

You've turned into sushi and you’re about to be someone’s lunch! Good thing you can still run! Save your fellow helpless sushi along the way, give them some tempura clubs, and maybe they’ll help buy you some time escaping the enemy.

Controls

SPACE - Jump
E - Use power up
ESC - Pause
